price: Maka Tuhan-nya memperkenankan doa Yūsuf dan Dia menghindarkan Yūsuf dari tipu daya mereka.  Sesungguhnya Dia-lah Yang Maha Mendengar lagi Maha Mengetahui.
arabic: فَٱسۡتَجَابَ لَهُۥ رَبُّهُۥ فَصَرَفَ عَنۡهُ كَيۡدَهُنَّۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-is'tajāba lahu rabbuhu faṣarafa ʿanhu kaydahunna innahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
